item.title: UN health agency spotlights stalled effort to close health divide across Europe, in new report
item.description: Progress on equal access to a healthy life for all, is at a standstill across Europe, a new report by the World Health Organization (WHO) revealed on Tuesday, despite their being a clear path to close gaps in national care.

item.title: ‘All efforts must be made’ to ensure peaceful elections for Guinea-Bissau, Security Council hears
item.description: Since the inauguration of Guinea-Bissau’s new Government in July, the political arena has been dominated by preparation for presidential elections, the assistant chief for UN peacekeeping operations in Africa told the Security Council on Tuesday, briefing members on the state of the nation, and the UN peacebuilding office there (UNIOGBIS).
